subject: RE: [junit] Capturing the standard out of a program that I'm testing
msgSnippet: Just set System.out to be your output stream (a PrintStream to be specific). -jason ... Jason Rogers                       Email:  jrogers@gltg.com Software
messageBody:
Just set System.out to be your output stream (a PrintStream to be specific).
 
-jason

Subject: [junit] Capturing the standard out of a program that I'm testing

Does anyone have any examples of code that captures the standard out of
a Java program.

I am trying to test a program that outputs using
System.out.print/println and I want to capture this output within my
test.

Thaks in advance. :-)
